name: Enterprise Risk Management Solution
short_description:
You might be thinking how important it is to categorize risks for building the effectiveness of your organization’s enterprise risk management (ERM). Working as an ERM analyst and researcher for years, I would say, risk classification is vital for the reason that it helps the organization identify additional risks. The risks that slip loose and remain unattended possess great threats. 
Risk categorization helps by providing ERM a structured format and better focus. The effectiveness and quality of your organization’s ERM program will improve if identification and analysis of risks are made on segregated risk areas. It allows easy risk responses as well.
The complication you may feel is that risk areas are many, and risks vary with each department. And hence it can be categorized under different formats.
An uncomplicated Enterprise risk management software model can be achieved if we break the risks down
